Text: Thank you so much for sharing this documentary - Informative, and Excellent Video quality too - I will seed for a month

Thank you for sharing, Eddie.

"The Genius of Mozart," however, is an intolerable, unbearably kitschy documentary in the mockumentary style complete with fake interviews, homemade video footage from the childhood of little Amadeus, and more. I watched it with incredulity, now wincing, now gaping... Download at you own peril!
